pages.text: New tiers of Goo and FE powered Goo

pages.title: Energized Goo
pages.text: A new goo that require $(bold)Forge Energy$() to stay alive$(br)Tier level : $(bold)5$()

pages.title: Creative Goo
pages.text: A simple goo that cannot die$(br)It can be toggled using any wrenches$(br)Tier level : $(bold)MAX$()

pages.title: Charged Old Goo
pages.text: Also every Tier 1-4 old Goo can be converted to 'Charged form' mainly made for content creators
